thread.title: Trump weighs mobilizing up to 100,000 National Guard troops for immigration roundups
thread.title_full: Trump weighs mobilizing up to 100,000 National Guard troops for immigration roundups

author: Garance Burke / Associated Press
title: Trump weighs mobilizing up to 100,000 National Guard troops for immigration roundups
text:
Trump weighs mobilizing National Guard for immigration roundups  29 AM By Garance Burke / Associated Press 
A draft memo obtained by The Associated Press outlines a Trump administration proposal under consideration to mobilize as many as 100,000 National Guard troops to round up unauthorized immigrants. 
Millions of those who would be affected in 11 states live nowhere near the Mexico border. 
The 11-page document calls for the unprecedented militarization of immigration enforcement as far north as Portland, Oregon, and as far east as New Orleans, La. 
If the proposal is implemented, governors in the affected states would have final approval on whether troops under their control participate.
